name: The Lab (itch) (Bryce)
description:
Left Mouse Button: Left Arm

Right Mouse Button: Right Arm

A: Go Left

D: Go Right

(W can give you a slight boost while moving)

To Climb: Use both of your arms. Now fling them up and down against the wall to climb

To Jump: Use both of your arms. Now push down on the thing you want to jump on with your arms.

You are now above it.
